languages.text: Инцендия Чорда продолжила беспощадную борьбу против ересей, одолевавших Простор. Не утруждая себя вопросами юрисдикции, она вольно вершила Имперское правосудие повсюду, умерщвляя богохульников тысячами. Витражи с ее ликом, освещенным пламенем костров, украшали часовни сектора, и чем крепче был внушаемый ею ужас, тем истовее молились праведные за Блаженную Карательницу.

Incendia Chorda continued her merciless fight against the heresies plaguing the Expanse. Not concerning herself with notions of jurisdiction, she brought the Imperium's justice everywhere she went, killing heretics by the thousands. Stained-glass windows with her likeness illuminated by bonfires graced the sector's chapels. With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.
languages.original_text: Инцендия Чорда продолжила беспощадную борьбу против ересей, одолевавших Простор. Не утруждая себя вопросами юрисдикции, она вольно вершила Имперское правосудие повсюду, умерщвляя богохульников тысячами. Витражи с ее ликом, освещенным пламенем костров, украшали часовни сектора, и чем крепче был внушаемый ею ужас, тем истовее молились праведные за Блаженную Карательницу.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda has continued her merciless fight against the heresies that overtook the Expanse. She did not bother herself with questions of jurisdiction, bringing Imperial justice to every corner of the region and killing blasphemers in thousands. Stained-glass windows with her image illuminated by bonfire flames graced chapels in the sector. With the grip of fear she instilled tightening, the prayers of the pious became more and more fervent as they revered the Gracious Chastiser.

With the grip of fear she instilled tightening, the prayers of the pious became more and more fervent as they revered the Gracious Chastiser.

With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达继续无情打击着肆虐科罗努斯扩区的异端。她毫不在意司法管辖权这个概念，将帝国的正义带至她所到的每个角落，杀死了成千上万的异端分子。绘着她肖像的彩色玻璃窗被篝火照亮，扩区的教堂熠熠生辉。库尔达所灌输的恐惧越来越深，而出于对惩戒的敬畏，所有虔诚者的祈祷也变得越发热诚。
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda continued her merciless fight against the heresies plaguing the Expanse. Not concerning herself with notions of jurisdiction, she brought the Imperium's justice everywhere she went, killing heretics by the thousands. Stained-glass windows with her likeness illuminated by bonfires graced the sector's chapels. With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达继续无情打击着占领科罗努斯扩区的异端。她毫不在意司法管辖权这个概念，将帝国的正义带至她所到的每个角落，杀死了成千上万的异端分子。绘着她肖像的彩色玻璃窗被篝火照亮，扩区的教堂熠熠生辉。库尔达所灌输的恐惧越来越深，而出于对惩戒的敬畏，所有虔诚者的祈祷也变得越发热诚。

languages.text: Incendia Chorda setzte ihren gnadenlosen Kampf gegen die Ketzereien fort, welche sich in der Ausdehnung ausbreiteten. Sie scherte sich nicht um Zuständigkeiten, sondern trug die Gerechtigkeit des Imperiums überall hin, wo sie gerade war. Sie tötete Tausende von Ketzern. Buntglastfenster mit ihrem Abbild zierten die Kapellen des Sektors, erhellt durch Scheiterhaufen. Je länger ihre Herrschaft der Furcht wurde, desto eifriger wurden die Gebete der Frommen und desto größer ihre Ehrerbietung vor der Gnädigen Straferin.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda continued her merciless fight against the heresies plaguing the Expanse. Not concerning herself with notions of jurisdiction, she brought the Imperium's justice everywhere she went, killing heretics by the thousands. Stained-glass windows with her likeness illuminated by bonfires graced the sector's chapels. With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda setzte ihren gnadenlosen Kampf gegen die Ketzereien fort, welche sich in der Ausdehnung ausbreiteten. Sie scherte sich nicht um Zuständigkeiten, sondern trug die Gerechtigkeit des Imperiums überall hin, wo sie gerade war. Sie tötete Tausende von Ketzern. Buntglastfenster mit ihrem Abbild zierten die Kapellen des Sektors, erhellt durch Scheiterhaufen. Je länger ihre Herrschaft der Furcht wurde, desto eifriger wurden die Gebete der Frommen und desto größer ihre Ehrerbietung vor der Gnädigen Straferin.

languages.text: Incendia Chorda continua sa lutte sans merci contre les hérésies gangrénant les Étendues. Sans se soucier un seul instant de notions de juridiction, elle dispensa la justice de l'Imperium au fil de ses déplacements, éliminant des hérétiques par milliers. Des vitraux à son effigie, éclairés par les flammes des bûchers, projetaient leurs couleurs chatoyantes dans les chapelles du secteur. Sous le regard acéré et terrifiant de la Gracieuse Punisseuse, les prières des fidèles se firent plus ferventes que jamais.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda continued her merciless fight against the heresies plaguing the Expanse. Not concerning herself with notions of jurisdiction, she brought the Imperium's justice everywhere she went, killing heretics by the thousands. Stained-glass windows with her likeness illuminated by bonfires graced the sector's chapels. With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda continua sa lutte sans merci contre les hérésies qui tentaient de s'emparer des Étendues. Sans se soucier un seul instant de notions telles que la juridiction, elle dispensa la justice de l'Imperium au fil de ses déplacements, éliminant des hérétiques par milliers. Des vitraux à son effigie, éclairés par les flammes des bûchers, projetaient leurs couleurs chatoyantes dans les chapelles du secteur. Sous le regard acéré et terrifiant de la Gracieuse Punisseuse, les prières des fidèles se firent plus ferventes que jamais.

languages.text: Incendia Chorda continuó su lucha despiadada contra las herejías que plagaban la Extensión. Abandonando toda noción de jurisdicción, llevó la justicia del Imperium allá adonde fue, matando a miles de herejes. Las capillas del sector encargaron vidrieras con su imagen y las iluminaron con hogueras. Bajo su aterradora mano, las oraciones de los piadosos se volvieron más fervientes por su reverencia a la Castigadora Clemente.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda continued her merciless fight against the heresies plaguing the Expanse. Not concerning herself with notions of jurisdiction, she brought the Imperium's justice everywhere she went, killing heretics by the thousands. With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda continuó su lucha despiadada contra las herejías que se propagaban por la Extensión. Abandonando toda noción de jurisdicción, llevó la justicia del Imperium allá adonde fue, matando a miles de herejes. Las capillas del sector encargaron vidrieras con su imagen y las iluminaron con hogueras. Bajo su aterradora mano, las oraciones de los piadosos se volvieron más fervientes por su reverencia a la Castigadora Clemente.

languages.text: インセンディア・チョーダは、エクスパンスを荒らす異端に対して無慈悲な戦いを続けていた。管轄権にこだわらず、彼女は行く先々で帝国の正義を貫き、何千もの異端者を殺害した。篝火に照らされた彼女の肖像が描かれたステンドグラスの窓は、この地域の礼拝堂を飾った。彼女の恐怖の掌握が強まるにつれ、敬虔な人々の祈りは、慈悲深い懲罰者への崇敬の念をますます熱くするようになった。
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda continued her merciless fight against the heresies plaguing the Expanse. Not concerning herself with notions of jurisdiction, she brought the Imperium's justice everywhere she went, killing heretics by the thousands. Stained-glass windows with her likeness illuminated by bonfires graced the sector's chapels. With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.

traits.locale_text: インセンディア・チョーダは、エクスパンスを覆う異端に対して無慈悲な戦いを続けていた。管轄権にこだわらず、彼女は行く先々で帝国の正義を貫き、何千もの異端者を殺害した。篝火に照らされた彼女の肖像が描かれたステンドグラスの窓は、この地域の礼拝堂を飾った。彼女の恐怖の掌握が強まるにつれ、敬虔な人々の祈りは、慈悲深い懲罰者への崇敬の念をますます熱くするようになった。

languages.text: İncendia Chorda, Enginlik'e musallat olan kâfirliklere karşı acımasız savaşını sürdürdü. Yetki alanı gibi detayları umursamadan, gittiği her yere İmparatorluk'un adaletini götürdü ve binlerce kâfiri öldürdü. Sektördeki şapellerde, onun suretinin resmedildiği vitrayların altında kutlama ateşleri yakıldı. Yumruğunu daha da sıktıkça saldığı korku arttı. Bu da inananların, daha da coşkuyla Lütufkâr Cezalandırıcı'nın hürmetine dualar etmesine yol açtı.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda continued her merciless fight against the heresies plaguing the Expanse. Not concerning herself with notions of jurisdiction, she brought the Imperium's justice everywhere she went, killing heretics by the thousands. Stained-glass windows with her likeness illuminated by bonfires graced the sector's chapels. With her tightening grip of fear, the prayers of the pious became ever more fervent in their reverence of the Gracious Chastiser.

traits.locale_text: İncendia Chorda, Enginlik'e musallat olmuş kâfirliklere karşı verdiği merhamet nedir bilmeyen savaşına devam etti. Yetki alanı gibi detayları umursamadan, gittiği her yere İmparatorluk'un adaletini götürdü, her seferinde binlerce kâfiri öldürdü. Sektördeki şapellerde, onun suretinin resmedildiği vitrayların altında kutlama ateşleri yakıldı. Yumruğu daha da sıkılaştıkça, saldığı korku da arttı, korku arttıkça, inananların Lütufkâr Cezalandırıcı'nın hürmetine ettiği dualar da giderek daha hararetli bir hâl aldı.
